Name: 3D Modeling Clay
Description: Create 3D emoji sculptures that look like colorful hand-molded modeling clay
Full_Prompt: Create a highly detailed 3D rendering of the {EMOJI OR REFERENCE IMAGE} sculpted from colorful modeling clay. The emoji should show visible fingerprints, uneven textures, and slight imperfections like real hand-molded clay. Use bright pastel colors and soft natural lighting on a neutral background. The modeling clay must look slightly matte and squishy, with an organic, childlike charm. Center the emoji in the frame.
Style_Keywords: modeling clay, 3D rendering, fingerprints, pastel colors, childlike
Use_Case: Educational content, craft tutorials, emoji redesign

Name: Felt Fabric
Description: Transform logos into soft felt fabric creations with hand-sewn details
Full_Prompt: Create a highly detailed 3D rendering of this logo made from colorful felt fabric. The logo should have a soft, slightly fuzzy texture, with visible seams and hand-sewn details. Use [bright or pastel] colors and soft natural light against a black background. Emphasize the handmade, artisanal, and warm feel of the felt emoji. Center the felt fabric logo in the image without adding any elements.
Style_Keywords: felt fabric, hand-sewn, artisanal, fuzzy texture, handmade
Use_Case: Craft branding, textile design, artisanal products

Name: Knitted Texture
Description: Create knit yarn versions of logos with visible knitting patterns and textures
Full_Prompt: Transform the attached image into a soft, cozy knit creation made entirely of yarn. Render the logo as if it were handcrafted with visible knitting patterns like stockinette, ribbing, or seed stitch, using vibrant, color-varied yarns. Emphasize the woven, interlocking structure of the symbol with realistic fuzzy textures and slight thread imperfections to evoke warmth and craftsmanship. Style the overall piece like a plush toy or a winter holiday decoration. Use warm, indoor lighting and place the knit logo on a wood-textured table for a cozy, homey aesthetic. keep the original form, make it stuffed (like a stuffed toy)
Style_Keywords: knitted, yarn, stockinette, plush toy, cozy, handcrafted
Use_Case: Winter branding, craft design, holiday content

Style_Keywords: embroidery, patches, stitching, thread outline, uniform
